languages.text: Ожившая легенда с нижних палуб угрожает безопасности Лорд-капитана и всего флагмана. Пришло время Кибелле, щиту, мечу и тени Домин, сплести кровавую паутину, в которую угодит сеятель раздора.
languages.translation_comment:
варианты названий:
- The Saint. The Reversed Sword. The Monster.
- When the card is reversed

варианты названий:
- The Saint. The Reversed Sword. The Monster.
- When the card is reversed

languages.text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.
languages.original_text: Ожившая легенда с нижних палуб угрожает безопасности Лорд-капитана и всего флагмана. Пришло время Кибелле, щиту, мечу и тени Домин, сплести кровавую паутину, в которую угодит сеятель раздора.

traits.locale_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the shield, the sword and the shadow of Enim, to weave a sanguine web that will ensnare the sower of discord.

A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the shield, the sword and the shadow of Enim, to weave a sanguine web that will ensnare the sower of discord.

A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

languages.text: Eine lebende Legende der unteren Decks bedroht die Sicherheit des Lord Captains und des gesamten Flaggschiffs. Es wird Zeit, das Kibella, die Klinge und das Schwert {mf|des|der} Domin, ein blutiges Netz zu spinnen und diesen Säer der Zwietracht zu fangen.
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

traits.locale_text: Eine lebende Legende der unteren Decks bedroht die Sicherheit des Lord Captains und des gesamten Flaggschiffs. Es wird Zeit, das Kibella, die Klinge und das Schwert {mf|des|der} Domin, ein blutiges Netz zu spinnen und diesen Säer der Zwietracht zu fangen.

languages.text: Una leyenda viviente de las cubiertas inferiores amenaza la seguridad {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y de toda la nave insignia. Ha llegado la hora de que Kibellah, arma, escudo y sombra {mf|del|de la} Domin, teja una red sanguinolenta para atrapar a esta semilla de la discordia.
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

traits.locale_text: Una leyenda viviente de las cubiertas inferiores amenaza la seguridad {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y de toda la nave insignia. Ha llegado la hora de que Kibellah, arma, escudo y sombra {mf|del|de la} Domin, teja una red sanguinolenta para atrapar a esta semilla de la discordia.

languages.text: 下位デッキの生ける伝説が、ロード・キャプテンと旗艦全体の安全を脅かしている。ドミンの刃であり盾であり影であるキベラが血に濡れた網を織り、この不和の種を撒いた人物を捕らえる時が来た。
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

traits.locale_text: 下位デッキの生ける伝説が、ロード・キャプテンと旗艦全体の安全を脅かしている。ドミンの刃であり盾であり影であるキベラが血に濡れた網を織り、この不和の種を撒いた人物を捕らえる時が来た。

languages.text: 底层甲板的传奇人物正在威胁领主舰长与整艘旗舰的安全，是时候让秘者的利刃，坚盾与影子绮贝菈出马了。让她编织一张血红色的罗网，抓住这个宣扬分裂的叛徒。
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

traits.locale_text: 底层甲板的传奇人物正在威胁领主舰长与整艘旗舰的安全，是时候让秘者的利刃，坚盾与影子绮贝菈出马了。让她编织一张血红色的罗网，抓住这个宣扬分裂的叛徒。

languages.text: Une légende vivante des ponts inférieurs menace la sécurité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de l'ensemble du vaisseau amiral. L'heure est venue pour Kibellah, lame, bouclier et ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin, de tisser une toile de sang afin de capturer ce fauteur de troubles.
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.

traits.locale_text: Une légende vivante des ponts inférieurs menace la sécurité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de l'ensemble du vaisseau amiral. L'heure est venue pour Kibellah, lame, bouclier et ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin, de tisser une toile de sang afin de capturer ce fauteur de troubles.

languages.text: Alt güvertelerde yaşayan bir efsane, hem Lord Kaptan'ın hem de tüm geminin güvenliğini tehdit ediyor. Domin'in kılıcı, kalkanı ve gölgesi olan Kibellah'nın kana bulanmış bir ağ örerek nifak tohumları eken bu haini yakalamasının vakti geldi.
languages.original_text: A living legend from the lower decks threatens the safety of the Lord Captain and the entire flagship. It is now time for Kibellah, the Domin's blade, shield, and shadow, to spin a sanguine web and catch this sower of discord.
